design_system.name: Battwheels OS - Industrial Intelligence
design_system.description: A high-performance, industrial-grade design system for EV failure intelligence. Combines the raw utility of F1 telemetry with the clean precision of modern SaaS.

usage_rules: Headings MUST use 'Barlow' and be uppercase for H1/H4 to convey industrial strength.
Body text MUST use 'Manrope' for high legibility.
Data values, IDs, and code snippets MUST use 'JetBrains Mono'.
Use 'tracking-tight' for large headings to create density.
Backgrounds are Deep Obsidian (#050505), NOT pure black.
Primary Brand (#0B462F) is used for structural elements (headers, sidebars).
Accent (#65D396) is the 'Live Wire' - used for CTAs, active states, and high-confidence AI matches.
NEVER use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Borders are critical. Use 1px borders to define hierarchy instead of shadows.

rules: Cards should have sharp or slightly rounded corners (max 4px).
Avoid large empty spaces in dashboards; aim for data density.
Use 'border-r' and 'border-b' on grid items to create a 'technical' look.

buttons.primary: bg-[#65D396] text-[#050505] hover:bg-[#4ADE80] font-bold uppercase tracking-wide rounded-sm shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(101,211,150,0.3)] transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#65D396] text-[#65D396] hover:bg-[#65D396]/10 font-medium uppercase tracking-wide rounded-sm

cards.default: bg-[#0B1210] border border-white/10 rounded-md p-6 relative overflow-hidden

inputs.default: bg-[#050505] border border-white/20 focus:border-[#65D396] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#65D396] rounded-sm text-white placeholder:text-gray-600

visual_enhancers.scanlines: background: repeating-linear-gradient(0deg, transparent, transparent 2px, #000 3px); opacity: 0.1; pointer-events: none;
visual_enhancers.noise: background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/200' opacity='0.05'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)'/%3E%3C/svg%3E");

rules: Micro-interactions ONLY. No bouncy or springy animations.
Transitions should be fast (150ms-200ms) and linear or ease-out.
Hover states should be instant and clear.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text contrast ratio is at least 4.5:1 against the dark background.
accessibility.focus: Focus rings MUST be visible and use the Accent color (#65D396).

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all icons. Style them with 'stroke-width={1.5}' for a technical look.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Update 'tailwind.config.js' to include the new color palette (Deep Obsidian, Dark Green, Vibrant Green).
2. GLOBAL STYLES: Update 'index.css' to set the default background to #050505 and text to #FFFFFF. Add the 'scanlines' and 'noise' utility classes.
3. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components. Remove large border-radius (set to '0.25rem' or '0px'). Add 1px borders to cards.
4. LAYOUT: Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the dashboard. Ensure high data density.
5. CHARTS: Use Recharts. Style them to match the dark theme (dark tooltips, green lines/bars).
6. AI FEATURES: Highlight AI suggestions with the Vibrant Green accent and a subtle glow effect.
7. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
